sentence.Network_en: Red rose can activize the man's appetency of conquest.
sentence.Network_cn: 红玫瑰能激起男人的征服欲和分泌雄性激素,但是要与一个真正热情如火的红玫瑰生活,很多男人并没有这样的信心.

sentence.Network_en: My character geniality, have the appetency.

sentence.Network_en: Appetency is infinite, while the interest is limited.
sentence.Network_cn: 欲望是无穷的, 利益是有限的.
